title: Access to .edu email
content: I'm currently locked out of my pesu issued email and I need to use it for my class. Whom can I contact regarding the password change?

comments.body: For any password related queries: pesu.videos@pes.edu
The password is usually your SRN in caps, did you try it?
For our batch, They set a random generated password by default and was asked to set up own password while logging in
arent u the gates of heaven guy? how is pes ma guy
stuff is looking less heavenly :'), but we still balling lmao
